overview: In this compelling new series, four men step out of the closet to find the sexual encounters they crave. Married, frustrated stud Nick Capra meets up with model Jessie Colter to experience male love for the first time. Released felon Tommy Defendi finally meets unexpectedly hot prison pen pal Matt Stevens, and cocky Ty Roderick agrees to initiate shy young virgin Davey Anthony. Finally, jacked bodybuilder Trenton Ducati meets up with sultry, young Ludo Sander for a sexy workout date.
title: Men Seeking Men
